name: galleryberg-monorepo
description: Galleryberg Gallery Block - Monorepo for Free and Pro versions
author: Dotcamp

scripts.build:all: pnpm run build:admin && pnpm run build:galleryberg && pnpm run build:pro
scripts.zip:galleryberg: pnpm run build:admin && pnpm run build:galleryberg && cd packages/galleryberg-gallery-block && zip -r ../../releases/galleryberg-gallery-block.zip . -x '*.git*' 'node_modules/*' 'src/*' 'package*.json' 'pnpm-lock.yaml' 'composer.json' 'composer.lock' 'README.md' 'webpack.config.js' '.DS_Store' '*.log'
scripts.zip:pro: pnpm run build:admin && pnpm run build:pro && cd packages/galleryberg-gallery-block-pro && zip -r ../../releases/galleryberg-gallery-block-pro.zip . -x '*.git*' 'node_modules/*' 'src/*' 'package*.json' 'pnpm-lock.yaml' 'composer.json' 'composer.lock' 'README.md' 'webpack.config.js' '.DS_Store' '*.log'
scripts.zip:both: pnpm run prezip && pnpm run build:all && pnpm run zip:galleryberg && pnpm run zip:pro && echo '\nâœ… ZIP files created in releases/ folder'
scripts.release: pnpm run lint && pnpm run build:all && pnpm run zip:both
